title: Alex Jones Show - 2011 Apr 20 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Wednesday, 20 April 2011


[sebaygo1]


Scheduled Guests
................

From the Infowars web site ::

 
Alex welcomes back to the show British politician, public speaker, and critic of the theory of anthropogenic-based climate change, Lord Christopher Monckton. In February, Monckton announced his plan to run for the Scottish Parliament. 

Alex also talks with Prison Planet journalist, Steve Watson, about the western destabilization of the Middle East and African countries as the United States, the UK, and NATO prepare a ground invasion on Libya. 

Author, researcher, and GCN radio host Webster Tarpley also taks with Alex about the situation in the Middle East.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
